actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To reauthorize the National Women's Business Council, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Women's Business Council Reauthorization Act of 1993

summary.text: National Women's Business Council Reauthorization Act of 1993 - Amends the Women's Business Ownership Act of 1988 to: (1) increase from nine to 11 the authorized number of members on the National Women's Business Council; (2) require one such member to be appointed by the President; and (3) authorize appropriations for FY 1994 and 1995 for Council purposes.

titles.title: National Women's Business Council Reauthorization Act of 1993
To reauthorize the National Women's Business Council, and for other purposes.
